creator: nick@chalko.com

text:
Nick, can you put this in a directory preserving zip relative to jakarta-poi? 
It wasn't clear to me WHERE this should go...  My gut says in "contrib" but I
trust your judgement.  As soon as I gather that I'll commit this.  sorry it took
so long.

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text: information asked for but not provided.

creator: nick@chalko.com
text:
Sorry, I missed the request.  
I will resubmit.
